name: ForeScout CounterACT
description: This app implements various network access control actions for ForeScout

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration

actions.verbose: This action requires Web API credential in asset configuration.
This action requires Web API credential in asset configuration.

example_values: When a device is NAT, its other classifications may be inaccurate. Therefore, we put the NAT detection first.

Classify the hosts into the following groups for easier management:

1. NAT devices
2. Windows systems
3. Linux/Unix systems
4. Macintosh systems
5. Network gear
6. Printers
7. Unclassified

Required parameters:
Network Segment

Method:
Re-classification is done on every admission and at least once a day using passive and active fingerprinting.

actions.description: Get the properties of a host
actions.verbose: One of the parameters (host_id, host_ip, or host_mac) is required and the first to be provided is used (in that order). This action requires Web API credential in asset configuration.

host_id.description: Host ID of device (Used first, if provided)

host_ip.description: Current local IP address of device (Used second, if provided)

host_mac.description: Host MAC address of device (Used last, if provided)

actions.verbose: This action requires Web API credential in asset configuration.

rule_id.description: Comma separated list of policies or policy sub-rules

prop_val.description: Comma separated list of host property values (ie: Prop_String=Sales,Prop_Int=5)

actions.description: Install a virtual firewall with a property
actions.verbose: This action requires DEX credential in asset configuration.

host_key_name.description: Type of identifier used to specify the endpoint

host_key_value.description: IP or MAC address of the virtual firewall to install

property_name.description: The property that will be added

example_values: Successfully updated [1] properties for new host [ip=10.1.16.3]
Message: Successfully updated [1] properties for new host [ip=10.1.16.3]
Successfully updated [1] properties for new host [ip=10.1.16.3]

actions.description: Delete a property of a host
actions.verbose: This action requires DEX credential in asset configuration.

host_key_name.description: Type of identifier used to specify the host

host_key_value.description: Identifier value used to specify the host

property_name.description: The property that will be deleted

actions.description: Update a property of a host
actions.verbose:
This action requires DEX credential in asset configuration.

The created new host will be only seen on UI when the host value is in the range of IP segment configured in ForeScout CounterACT.

The property_name field is the Property Tag field of Property created in CounterACT. This action won’t support composite type of property.

host_key_name.description: Type of identifier used to specify the host

host_key_value.description: Identifier value used to specify the host

property_name.description: The property that will be modified

property_value.description: The new value of the property

create_host.description: If set to true and the host is not known to CounterACT, create a new host

example_values: Message: Successfully updated [1] properties for host [ip=10.1.16.161]

actions.description: Update a list by adding, deleting, or deleting all values from it
actions.verbose: This action requires DEX credential in asset configuration.

values.description: Comma separated list of values to update. This field is required for add_list_values and delete_list_values actions

example_values: Message: Successfully added values to the [1] lists.
Successfully added values to the [1] lists.
